response.overview: This little film is for my two characters Phuong and Charlee, part of a bigger world-building I'm currently working on. It takes place in their final senior year of high school, where Phuong wonders whether to confess to Charlee his feelings, knowing that Charlee is leaving abroad for college. A mixture of bittersweet unrequited love, appreciation for youth and life, and longing for it to stay.  This is also a letter to many occasions of unsaid feelings in the past. Making this film was a therapeutic experience, and I thank everyone for helping me with making my visions a reality, as well as the ones that I never got to say to.
response.tagline: My final film for Exp Anim Class at Calarts! ðŸ¦‹
response.title: a love letter - Experimental Film 2021
